page.title: 06My Day K.Walters 3 Ashford C
page.content: factory work.Gave job list to Emma and Kate to be done before playing 1.washing up,2.making beds,3.tidy rooms,4.hoover hall and lounge. Prepared(under supervision) stew for lunch .Worked in garden . Served lunch.Washed up with Kate.Made cup of coffee for all.Worked in garden,tidied sheds and garage.Made a cup of tea for Moira. Worked in garden.Bought Emma,Katie, Vicky a lolly.Made tea for Moira. Had a bath,went to bed at 11.30 Emma Walters. Woke up 7.00 a.m.and made my bed.Got dressed. Went down to breakfast- two pieces of toast.Then jobs for Mum- hoovering,washing up.Brushed teeth and washed face,Gina called.We played. Lunch. we had stew and Damson puree. During lunch Vicky phoned and came round to play at 3.00.So did Gina. Then played till 6 p.m.Then had tea
